Hello NewsActivity FaqActivity ChatActivity SettingsActivity AboutActivity OfferActivity PartnersActivity LanguageActivity NewCardActivity Search Fuel Coffee Flowers and Sweet Cinema Entertainment Restaurants Toys Certificate of fuel 100 Certificate of fuel 500 Certificate of fuel 250 100 What to give to the driver? Of course the fuel certificate! By means of the certificate it is possible to get any fuel of a network of gas stations Validity: days Valid until: Receiver name Wishes I agree with give RefillActivity HistoryActivity Rules TransferActivity Conditions of use: "Certificate purchases can only be made in one visit. \n\n If the purchase amount is less than the amount indicated on the certificate, the difference between the face value of the certificate and the purchase amount is not refunded. \n\n If the purchase amount exceeds the face value indicated in the certificate, the buyer can pay the difference between this amount and the face value of the certificate. When making a purchase with a gift certificate, discounts on discount cards of regular customers are provided as part of the current discount program. Items purchased with gift certificates can be exchanged for other items. \n\nWhen returning goods purchased under a gift certificate, a new gift certificate is issued for the same amount. Gift certificates cannot be exchanged for cash equivalents."
